chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Nature of Pain
chapters.info: Katerine Alruddin, p. 66—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. She has dark, slightly curly hair. Though she obviously keeps it secret, she is actually of the Black Ajah, and has been for twelve years. She was captured by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells, but escaped her captors, most likely with assistance from Darkfriends. She and Tarna took rooms in Garon Burlow's house while the Younglings were there. She is among those who kidnapped Egwene, and is now one of the sisters charged with guarding her and dosing her with forkroot tea while she is a prisoner in the Tower. crosserf("Elaida") has been relying on her more and more while Tarna is out of the Tower.
